title: Plaque Representing the Virgin of the Immaculate Conception
description: Plaque Representing the Virgin of the Immaculate Conception; Francesco Natale Juvara (Italian, 1673 - 1759); Messina, Sicily, Italy; 1730 - 1740; Silver; gilt bronze; lapis lazuli; 69.7 × 52.1 cm (27 7/16 × 20 1/2 in.); 85.SE.127; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
